snippet: The bride, a sales manager for an online furniture business, and the bridegroom, a designer of athletic footwear, are married on Long Island.
lead_paragraph: Riki Blair Hirsch, a daughter of Randé Hirsch of Syosset, N.Y., and the late Kenneth W. Hirsch, was married Saturday evening at the Woodbury Jewish Center in Woodbury, N.Y., to Jared Charles Udell, a son of Allyn S. Udell and Dr. Ira J. Udell of Manhasset, N.Y. Rabbi Raphael Adler, the center's rabbi, performed the ceremony. The bride, 27, and the bridegroom, 30, met at Syracuse University, from which they both graduated.
